content: निधन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [निवृत्तं धनं यस्मात्; <ls>Uṇ. 2. 81.</ls>] Poor, indigent; अहो निधनता सर्वापदामास्पदं <ls>Mk. 1. 14.</ls> --नः --नं {@--1@} Destruction, annihilation, death, loss; स्वधर्में निधनं श्रेयः <ls>Bg. 3. 35</ls>; म्लेच्छनिवहनिधने कलयसि करवालं <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; कल्पांतेष्वपि न प्रयाति निधनं विद्याख्यमंतर्धनं <ls>Bh. 2. 16</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 21</ls>; <ls n="Pt.">5. 95.</ls> {@--2@} The concluding passage at the end of a Sāman sung in chorus. {@--3@} The {%finale%} (in music). {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of the eighth lunar mansion. {@--5@} Conclusion, end, termination. {@--6@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Residence; receptacle. --नः The head of a family. --नं Family, race.
